line_1: For all the host, from rear to van,
And warm in glowing Velvets leads the Van:
line_2: See a Battalion lac'd with Point d'Espan,

line_1: Havock and devastation in the van,
line_2: It marches o'er the prostrate works of man,

line_1: Tumultuous horror brooded o'er her van,
line_2: Presaging wrath to Poland — and to man!

line_1: Fight in his sacred cause, and lead the van!
line_2: Friends of the world! restore your swords to man,

line_1: And, in the march of nations, led the van!
line_2: She the bold route of Europe's guilt began,

line_1: Error and Ignorance, which head the van,
line_2: Explain those savage beasts at war with man.
Beyond the noise of busy man,

line_1: Stalks yet unseen along the gleamy van.
line_2: Nor knows that Horror's form, a spectre wan,
